trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There was one other sighting in Denver on or around October 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsOctober 17, 2011 10:30PM While sitting on my balcony I saw a fussy gray object silently traveling from south to north in a straight line. The sky was clear. There was no reflection of moon light off the object. At first it appeared ghost like. As it got further to the north I went the balcony railing and noticed the object appeared to elongate into a boomerang shaped object before going out of sight. The only other moving object was a commercial aircraft in a down leg approach to DIA for landing.
Summary: Gost like blob changing to boomerange in distant
